constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 170 (Wednesday, September 29, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H5552-H5553]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JOHNSON of South Dakota:
H.R. 5411.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H5553]]
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, House Administration, Rules, and the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: GET IT DONE Act
